content:
# Andamio platform: building trust through the Cardano blockchain.

![](https://ucarecdn.com/525aaddb-0680-430e-9e83-696922568ba4/)

To us, one of the most exciting things about Project Catalyst - and more generally, about the Web3 ecosystem at large - is that we are always encountering new ways of üê£collaborating with other people and other organizations.

We believe that this same excitement can be infused into the üìàreal economy.

Andamio is a platform that supports trust-building among groups of people in short periods, via Cardano transactions that unlock collaboration, contribution, and reputation building. On-chain. In real time.

Website: [andamio.io](//andamio.io)

X: @andamioplatform

## 2 contributors
